extends java.lang.Object
    The Android SDK entry point for Android platform.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init(android.content.Context uiContext)
        Initialization of Android SDK. This must be called before any other interaction with Android SDK classes.
        Parameters:
        uiContext - Android context *MUST* be a UI context eg Activity / Fragment / View

      • init

        public static void init(android.content.Context uiContext,
                        ThermalLog.LogLevel level)
        Initialization of Android SDK. This must be called before any other interaction with Android SDK classes.
        Parameters:
        uiContext - Android context *MUST* be a UI context eg Activity / Fragment / View
        level - Android SDK logging level
